DOC.brief_summary: Rationale . Sleep loss risk factor cardiovascular event mediate endothelial dysfunction . Objective . To determine 7 week exercise train limit cardiovascular dysfunction induce total sleep deprivation ( TSD ) healthy young men . Methods : 16 subject examine 40-h TSD , 7 week interval exercise training . Vasodilatation induce ACh , insulin heat ( 42°C ) well pulse wave velocity ( PWV ) , blood pressure heart rate ( HR ) assess baseline , TSD , one night sleep recovery . Biomarkers endothelial activation , inflammation , hormone bemeasured morning blood sample 07:00
DOC.criteria: Healthy Men 18 35 yr Consumming 400 mg caffeine per day , Body mass index ( BMI ) great 30 kg/m² , Taking medication . Excessive daytime somnolence ( Epworth Sleepiness Scale > 9 ) Sleep complaint ( Pittsburgh Sleep Quality Index > 5 ) Inability consider intermediate chronotype Horne Ostberg questionnaire ( score < 31 > 69 ) Traines subject ( Ricci Gagnon questionnaire > 35 )
